verbs.description: < p > [ARG1: Melania Trump] [V: is] [ARGM-TMP: still] [ARG2: in the hospital] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] , [ARGM-TMP: four days after undergoing a “ successful ” procedure on Monday to treat what the White House has described as a “ benign kidney] condition.”</p >
